chapter.title: Installing ServiceMix
chapter.para: Install ServiceMix and start it a first time.

section.title: System requirements
section.para:
In order to function properly, Apache ServiceMix requires:
Java 5 JRE or higher At least 200 MB free disk space

section.title: Installation
section.para:
Download the appropriate archive for your platform:
apache-servicemix-&version;.tar.gz for Linux, Unix and Mac OS X apache-servicemix-&version;.zip for Windows
Extract the archive on your hard disk. Afterwards, you'll find this directory structure +- ant +- bin +- deploy +- etc +- examples +- lib \- system
